pr_title: Migrate RC to depend directly on Installations SDK.

timeline.message: Begin migrating to direct FIS dependency.
Migrate RC to directly depend on Installations SDK.
Migrate RC tests and ktx to FIS dependency.
Migrate RC Bandwagoner app to direct FIS dependency.
Remove google-services plugin from checked in bandwagoner app.
Update IID -> FIS in integration test.
Update docs to reference Installations SDK.

timeline.bodyText: How about mentioning "Firebase Installations" so that developers have all the info to potentially raise issues with Firebase?
timeline.author: andirayo

timeline.bodyText:
I know we already talked about this, but I strongly recommend to only upload the FIS auth token, because the auth token contains all the information needed on server side, particularly the FID.
Thus, uploading both values is redundancy and might lead to inconsistencies on server side.
As far as I understood our conversations, you are planning to get rid of uploading the FID in the future, but want to upload it for now to keep the current processes consistent.
That is absolutely fine. I just wanted to mention it again.
timeline.author: andirayo

timeline.bodyText:
Please use values that have a roughly correct format in order to make it easier for readers to understand what data is used / required here.
Examples:
FID: "'fL71_VyL3uo9jNMWu1L60S"
auth token: "eyJhbGciOiJF.eyJmaWQiOiJmaXMt.AB2LPV8wRQIhAPs4NvEgA3uhubH"
